name: ZOMBIE TOWN AHHH
description:
ZOMBIE TOWN AHHH!!!! - A 3D Zombie Survival RPG - Survive in a world taken over by zombies. Use your fists, various weapons and cars to defeat (or avoid) the zombies.

  • Multiplayer Modes (Dedicated Servers + Local Multiplayer)
  • Defeat zombies and become stronger.
  • Drive & Squish Zombies with over 8 Car types
  • Siphon fuel from cars to fuel the car of your choice
  • Search for food and weapons to survive
  • Destroy trees & cars for resources, craft new weapons
  • 80+ Type of Humans/Zombies
  • 5+ Vehicles to choose from
  • Lots of weapons to craft, find and use
